mapper.select: SELECT r.r_name, u.nickname, p.pay_id, re.rating, re.review_date, re.review_content FROM room r, reservation resv, users u, payment p, review re WHERE r.biz_id = resv.biz_id AND r.r_id = resv.r_id AND p.user_id = u.user_id AND resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND resv.user_id = p.user_id AND resv.resv_id = p.resv_id AND p.pay_id = re.pay_id AND r.biz_id = #{biz_id} ORDER BY re.review_date desc
SELECT count(*) totalReview, AVG(rating) avgReview FROM payment p, review re WHERE p.pay_id = re.pay_id AND p.biz_id = #{biz_id}

SELECT p.biz_id,p.r_id, p.user_id, re.review_content, re.rating, re.review_date, re.del_request ,p.pay_id FROM reservation resv, payment p, review re WHERE resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND resv.resv_id = p.resv_id AND resv.r_id = p.r_id AND resv.user_id = p.user_id AND p.pay_id = re.pay_id AND resv.biz_id = #{biz_id} ORDER BY
re.review_date desc
re.rating
re.rating desc
UPDATE review SET del_request = 'Y', del_reason = #{del_reason}, del_date = sysdate WHERE pay_id = #{pay_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) totalReview, p.biz_id FROM review re, payment p WHERE re.pay_id = p.pay_id AND p.biz_id = #{biz_id} GROUP BY p.biz_id

SELECT p.biz_id,p.r_id, p.user_id, re.review_content, re.rating, re.review_date, re.del_request, p.pay_id FROM reservation resv, payment p, review re WHERE resv.biz_id = p.biz_id AND resv.r_id = p.r_id AND resv.user_id = p.user_id AND resv.resv_id = p.resv_id AND p.pay_id = re.pay_id AND resv.biz_id = #{biz_id} ORDER BY
re.review_date desc
re.rating
re.rating desc
